item.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 soars past 5 million copies sold
item.content:encoded:
Image via Sandfall Interactive/Kepler Interactive.

Newsbrief: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 developer Sandfall Interactive and publisher Kepler Interactive have announced that over 5 million copies of the French studio's turn-based role-playing game have been sold worldwide.

The game crossed this milestone in just under 7 months after launching in April 2025. 

Sandfall Interactive creative director Guillaume Broche said that the studio is releasing a free content update for Expedition 33 as a "thank-you" to players in a statement accompanying the news. "We spent years working on our dream project, and to know it has resonated with fans around the world in such a powerful way is both wonderful and overwhelming," he said.



https://www.gamedeveloper.com/business/clair-obscur-expedition-33-soars-past-5-million-copies-sold
